summary: Make Sofia 2.0++ works with Requiem Overhaul Mod v1.8++
descriptionHtml:
Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia[/url] obviously.

The old Requiem patch for Sofia is broken because it reintroduced Sofia back into follower factions and such. And removed the nude bomb spell as well.

This is a total remake for her new version 2.0++ And as her combat style is fixed as a spell sword with light armor, she gets 4 additional perks to help her survive the harsh world better. Would suggest getting her after level 5 tho.
author: Deane
